Description:
Identifies IPs from which users grant access to other users on azure resources and alerts when a previously unseen source IP address is used.

Author: sawwinnnaung
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Granting Of Permissions To An Account
Query: sourcetype='azure-activitylogs' eql select * from _source_ where log like '%microsoft.authorization/roleassignments/write%'
